Craft better prompts together!

As our community grows, let's set some standards for sharing prompt templates. Reusable, multi-lingual, tested templates will help all users succeed.

Read our new guidelines for writing stable, high-quality public templates. Tips cover:

Using [PROMPT] and [TARGETLANGUAGE] placeholders
Writing clear metadata
Testing templates thoroughly pre-release
